inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input subset files (subsets#.out) for Spectrum and wavelength estimation

parameters.name: number_of_profiles
parameters.description: number of wave profiles derived required to estimate spectrum

parameters.name: coast_orientation
parameters.description: Coast normal orientation (nautical convention ex: 270-> West facing)

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: method for spectrum estimate: derived from wave series (subscene) or from radial projection of the subscene spectrum
